column1: Smoque BBQ////I've tried the chopped & sliced brisket
column2: pulled pork and the texas sausage. The brisket melt-in-your-mouth moist
column3: the pulled pork is juicy and the sausage was pretty flavorful (for the one bite that I manage to steal from the boyfriends plate.. oops). Highly recommend the mac'n'cheese
column4: some of the best I've ever had (and even reheats well.. if you can mange to not eat your entire meal in one sitting). Also had the cornbread
